categories: Category:Events during the High Republic Era

nodes.text: During the High Republic Era, members of the Jedi Order undertook a mission to the planet Sedri Minor. The Jedi had recently discovered the wreckage of a Hutt Clan starship attacked by the Nihil in the Kazlin system, which had been carrying a load of Vratixian barley that originated there. Jedi Master Sskeer was dispatched to investigate, accompanied by Ceret, but the Kotabi Jedi went missing after venturing into a field, which was only noticed by Terec, Ceret's bond-twin. Subsequently, Marshal Avar Kriss and Jedi Knight Keeve Trennis ventured to Sedri Minor themselves, only to encounter the Drengir, dangerous sentient plants.
